CatDescriptText: Cutline of image published in New Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, December 9, 1972, pg. 10 reads: "Fashion Models - Some of Pittsburgh's best-dressed served as models in the fashion review sponsored by Zeta Chapter of Lambda Kappa Mu Sorority recently at the Selma Burke Art Center. From left to right: Gerri Walker, a member of the New Pittsburgh Courier's Fashion Hall of Fame; Will Varner, Gladys Grimball, Hilda Logan, star of the show whose original designs were featured; Freddie Weaver and Lorraine McCoad, commentator.  Mrs. Logan is also one of the New Courier best-dressed."
TitMainTitle: Group portrait of fashion models, from left: Gerri Walker, Will or Bill Varner, Gladys Grimball, Hilda Logan, Freddie Weaver, and Lorraine McCoad, posed on runway in Selma Burke Art Center for Lambda Kappa Mu fashion review
